April 6, 1964
Mr* Lee H* Campion, Director
Division of Edue ation&l Communications
The University of the State of Hew York

Albany, Hew York
Dear Lee,
Thank you for your letter of March 24* 1964. I*ve been
awaiting word from Bill Harley concerning the next chairman of
the public relations committee $ this explains nay delay in
writing you* As soon as I have word whether or not I will
continue as chairman or a new chairman has been appointed Ifll
bring you up to date*
Sincerely,
Marion Corwell
Director
SE/eJh
CCS William Harley
